document_data.name: Url
document_data.mainbody: '''Url''' was a [[Dwarf|dwarven]] blacksmith and merchant in [[Mantol-Derith]].
document_data.Personality: Url disliked [[drow]] and [[duergar]]. He deeply regretted how his life was ruined by the evil Red Wizard.
document_data.History: Around [[1479 DR]], Url and his lover were captured by a [[Red Wizard of Thay]]. With the life of his lover in the wizard's hands, the wizard commanded Url to go to Mantol-Derith to sell weapons and collect information.
